name: Darker side of RuneClan
description:
Dark and simplified theme for RuneClan.com
It's somewhat finished (maybe I didn't notice or they changed something) and there was some objects that wasn't named so I couldn't change them.
But overall theme is neat and pleases eye.
My code ain't probably great either or easily commutable but it's something!
additional_info:
VERSION 1.1 | 10.03.2017

CHANGELOG:
>fixed shoutbox colors
>fixed make new forum post colors
>added custom icons for default profile pictures,
 for sort buttons sand for forum chat bubbles.
>added custom colors for item/info graphs and for gained level texts.
>fixed some other small things
